New Records: Luis Suárez scored his 69th international goal, a significant milestone
Key Match Events: Uruguay won the penalty shootout 4-3 after a 2-2 draw
Rodrigo Bentancur scored the opening goal
Luis Suárez forced a penalty shootout with his goal
Pre-Game Insights: The match was played in Charlotte, North Carolina, with 24,386 attendees
The game was less attended compared to the previous Colombia match
Post-Match Reflections: Uruguay manager Marcelo Bielsa criticized Copa América organizers
Uruguay secured third place in the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held on the same field as the previous Colombia match
Uruguay and Argentina share the most Copa titles with 15 each
